data.title: Giorgos Seferis â€“ Documentary
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 1963 was awarded to Giorgos Seferis "for his eminent lyrical writing, inspired by a deep feeling for the Hellenic world of culture"
data.text: Giorgos Seferis and his wife were in their home in the Athens suburb of Pangrati when it was announced that he was the first Greek ever to receive a Nobel Prize. Seferis, retired at the time of the award, devoted most of his time writing in his book-lined studio and collecting seashells.
